#calculate amino acid composition
aacomp <- aaComp(seq = ampep$Sequence) %>% as.data.frame()

# remove any column with 'Number' in the name
aacomp <- aacomp[,-grep('Number',names(aacomp))]

#swap rows and columns
aacomp <- t(aacomp) %>% as.data.frame()
#change rownames
rownames(aacomp) <- ampep$Entry.name
#change column names
names(aacomp) <- c("TinyAA", "SmallAA", "AliphaticAA", "AromaticAA", "NonPolarAA", "PolarAA", "ChargedAA","BasicAA", "AcidicAA")
